title: Is Kurt Cobain still alive? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, he is dead, unfortunately. However, many think no. And other fairly tales exist as well such as Elvis Presley is alive, 9–11 didn’t happen, Sandy Hook didn’t happen, even the Holocaust didn’t happen. If people are subject to NOT believe things that have been documented with clear evidence that DID HAPPEN, they will believe anything. Very sad how those people brag about their ignorance. (flat earths people as well) I have a friend who is fascinated with the Flat Earth concept. I’m like, “Bro, don’t be going back to the dark ages on me!” It’s bewildering, actually.
Some people think hes rivers cuomo from weezer but i think hes dead. It's more likely that kurt cobain was killed by courtney rather than him being in the band weezer.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Mohammed Saiful Alam Siddiquee
